>
[Wand of Clinging Rime](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2274)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 139 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A thin layer of frost coats this gnarled holly wand.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_frigid flurry_](/Spells.aspx?ID=916) of the indicated rank. After you cast the spell, the ice crystals freeze to flesh and other surfaces, clinging to the creatures in the area. Each creature that fails its save takes [persistent cold damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) with the amount determined by the wand's type.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _frigid flurry_ of the appropriate rank.
